title: Rules / Hydra - If Winter Comes, Can Spring Be Far Behind? (Doujinshi)
description: Follows directly after the events in Rules volume 1 Chapter 6 & Extra this continues the tale of Hikaru, Yuki, & friends. A glimpse into Hikaru's life, past, and feelings.
